verse.name: v1
verse.lines: "In the Beloved" accepted am I, Risen, ascended, and seated on high; Saved from all sin thro' His infinite grace, With the redeemed ones accorded a place

verse.name: c
verse.lines: "In the Beloved," God's marvelous grace Calls me to dwell in this wonderful place; God sees my Savior and then He sees me "In the Beloved," accepted and free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: "In the Beloved"--how safe my retreat, In the Beloved accounted complete; "Who can condemn me?" In Him I am free, Savior and Keeper forever is He.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: "In the Beloved" I went to the tree, There, in His Person, by faith I may see Infinite wrath rolling over His head, Infinite grace, for He died in my stead.
